Query.Sql: select NHSNumber as nhs_number, max(ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate) as death_date from [omop_staging].[sus_OP] where ReferralToTreatmentPeriodStatus = 36 and ReferralToTreatmentPeriodEndDate is not null and NHSNumber is not null group by NHSNumber

Explanation.Description: Discharge date of the patient's spell.
